text: Robin François (Robbe) De Hert (20 September 1942 – 24 August 2020) was an English-born Belgian movie director. He was born in Farnborough, Hampshire. His best known movies were De Witte van Sichem, Brylcream Boulevard and Lijmen/Het Been. De Hert died on 24 August 2020 from diabetes-related problems, aged 77.Regisseur Robbe De Hert (77) overleden ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1942 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from diabetes Category:English movie directors Category:Belgian movie directors Category:People from Hampshire
title: Robbe De Hert
